name: Prowlarr
description: Ensures the Prowlarr container or service is running and responsive.
check_cmd: if command -v docker >/dev/null 2>&1; then if docker ps --format '{{.Names}}' | grep -q '^prowlarr$'; then echo ok; else echo fix; fi; else echo ok; fi
fix_cmd: if command -v docker >/dev/null 2>&1; then docker start prowlarr 2>/dev/null || docker restart prowlarr 2>/dev/null || true; fi
verify_cmd: sleep 5; if curl -fs --max-time 5 http://localhost:9696/api/v1/system/status 2>/dev/null | grep -q 'Prowlarr'; then echo ok; else echo fail; fi
